title: U.S. investment banking : Number of establishments and employees
summary: Overall Employees is gradually decreasing, Establishments is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The order of lines according to average values of Number in thousands, in descending order is: 1. Employees, and lastly, 2. Establishments.
Establishments reported the lowest Number in thousands about 4.5 in Year 2008
The greatest difference of Number in thousands between Establishments and Employees occurs at Year 2007 and the smallest difference occurs at 2009.

max_summary: Overall Employees is gradually decreasing, Establishments is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The minimum Number in thousands about 4.5, occured at 2008 by Establishments.
